alert.note: Alert for Attala; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 6:21PM CDT until April 17 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR LEAKE...NORTHEASTERN RANKIN...SOUTHEASTERN ATTALA...SOUTHWESTERN WINSTON...NORTHWESTERN SCOTT AND EASTERN MADISON COUNTIES... At 620 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kosciusko to near Canton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Kosciusko and Mcadams around 625 PM CDT. Smyrna around 645 PM CDT. Goshen Springs around 650 PM CDT. Pisgah around 655 PM CDT. Zama around 700 PM CDT. Leesburg around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Redwater. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Attala; Leake; Madison; Rankin; Scott; Winston
